Exception Class

　The Exception class is a class for creating exception objects.
　The constructor syntax is as follows.

new Exception(<message>)
　The message is set to the message property of the created object.
　Also, the trace property records information such as the functions passed through until the exception occurred (recorded as a human-readable string).
　All exception objects generated by factors other than scripts are objects of the Exception class (for example, division error exceptions, etc.).

　More properties may be added in the future.

message

　The message property is a property that represents a string indicating the reason for the exception.
